detectors.description:
Kumo.addLiquidity(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#390-403) sends eth to arbitrary user

	- router.addLiquidityETH{value: bnbAmount}(address(this),tokenAmount,0,0,devWallet,block.timestamp) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#395-402)

detectors.description: Kumo.rescueERC20(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#460-462) ignores return value by IERC20(tokenAddress).transfer(owner(),amount) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#461)

Kumo.swapForFees() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#343-375) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- unitBalance = deltaBalance / (denominator - sellTaxes.liquidity) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#357)
	- ethToAddLiquidityWith = unitBalance * sellTaxes.liquidity (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d574a4b4c7ebbe0bf6e68bbc9fa62efa7f951945_Address.sol#358)
